评论概述: Two of the three pairs of pants I ordered were drastically too small in the waist.
评论详情: While that by itself might be insignificant it became a big deal.  Because the return window is thirty days and I didn't find out they were so small I could not wear them, I simply have to eat the loss.  The first pair I tried on and then wore fit fine.  I wore them for a short time on three occasions and did not try on either of the other two pairs until just after the thirty day return window had closed.  Neither of the other two pairs came close to fitting.  Now I am stuck with two pair that I cannot wear.  So if you happen to be like me and order more than a single pair of pants be careful.  Don't expect the obvious to be true.  For the number one selling golf pant on Amazon this is a terrible unexpected experience.

评论概述: Sizing is all over the board
评论详情: I bought a pair of pants a couple months ago and I really liked them. So I decided to buy a couple more. I ordered the exact brand and size. The tag says that the new pair of pants are 38w 32l. When I compared to my other pants they are more like 38w 33L. All of the pants are different sizes....some are tight, some are loose.

评论概述: For true to size, but slim and skinny
评论详情: These pants are almost everything I was looking for! I’m 6’2” and 165 lbs, and it’s tough to find pants that fit well. The waist and rear fit great, and the material is wonderfully thin — perfect for a day of golf or traveling, and they likely repel water.  I purchased the black 32x34 ones and they were not transparent at all. These would really be the perfect golf/travel pants if they weren’t so incredibly skinny. About halfway down the thigh they begin to narrow, and by the knee area they have cinched up tight. I don’t workout or have big calves, but these pants are still way too tight. I asked my wife for an honest opinion and when I walked around the corner she couldn’t help but laugh at me. 3 stars because the material and construction of the pants is great, but they were not advertised as slim fit and I wouldn’t have bought them if I had known.

never tried this brand before but was pleasantly surprised when i tried them on nice fit although more in the slim fit category material is light weight but arrived with many creases will try to iron out after washing for the price a good buy

My husband has the equivalent of these pants in the Under Amour brand and other than branding both pants are pretty much exactly the same minus the brand name price point. They are comfortable and of good quality. Will be purchasing again.
True to Size but a bit thin.  Not see through, but will keep me cool.  Very comfortable.
